title: Pareto processes for threshold exceedances in spatial extremes
authors:
Clement Dombry (UFC, LMB), Juliette Legrand (UBO, LMBA), Thomas Opitz
  (BioSP)
abstract:
We review some recent development in the theory of spatial extremes related
to Pareto Processes and modeling of threshold exceedances. We provide
theoretical background, methodology for modeling, simulation and inference as
well as an illustration to wave height modelling. This preprint is an author
version of a chapter to appear in a collaborative book.
